item.title: Ultimate Queen City Underground Tour
item.description: Discover a different side of Cincinnati on a guided tour of the city’s lesser-known history, underground tunnels, and even a hidden crypt. Whether you are new to the city or a long-time resident looking to learn more about the town, this guided tour provides unique insights and reveals secret corners of the city even most locals miss.

image.alt: Ultimate Queen City Underground Tour

item.title: Hidden Brewery Caverns Tour in Cincinnati with Beer Tasting
item.description: Go underground and journey far off the beaten track while in Cincinnati with this hidden brewery caverns tour. Explore two sets of beer caverns: the Linck Brewery tunnels and the Jackson Brewery tunnels. Visit the site where Johnny Cash filmed a movie and the inside of the last standing structures from the original Christian Moerlein Brewery complex (closed to the public for decades). Afterward, enjoy a beer tasting at the Northern Row Taproom.

image.alt: Hidden Brewery Caverns Tour in Cincinnati with Beer Tasting

item.title: Streetcar Food Tour and Findlay Market with Riverside Food Tours
item.description: Cincinnati is home to a thriving culinary scene but, for visitors, it can be hard to choose where to dine. Take the guesswork out of your visit by joining this streetcar tour that takes you to several different restaurants and a food market across multiple neighborhoods to sample their best dishes.

image.alt: Streetcar Food Tour and Findlay Market with Riverside Food Tours

item.title: The Escape Game Cincinnati: 60-Minute Adventures at The Banks
item.description: Think you can find your way out of some of Cincinnati’s most challenging escape rooms? Choose one of five themed-games and put your wits to the test! Sniff out gold in the California hills or break out of a prison. Pretend to be a secret agent, try to steal back a masterpiece from an art thief, or act like a kid again in the playground challenge. Work as a team to solve clues, complete puzzles, and win the game.

image.alt: The Escape Game Cincinnati: 60-Minute Adventures at The Banks

item.title: Top 10 Sites + Bites of Cincinnati Tour with Riverside Food Tours
item.description: Save time and money on this excursion that includes a guided tour of Cincinnati's top sights, from the banks of the Ohio River to downtown and Findlay Market; food tastings at some of the city's best restaurants, and an all-day streetcar pass so that (armed with some insider tips from your guide) you can spend the rest of the day exploring independently.

image.alt: Top 10 Sites + Bites of Cincinnati Tour with Riverside Food Tours

item.title: The Escape Game at Easton Town Center in Columbus
item.description: This escape room game in Columbus offers a chance to immerse yourself in a thrilling adventure. Featuring a choice of six different scenarios and assistance from a guide, the game will challenge you to complete a mission by searching for clues and solving puzzles. This is a fun and memorable activity for groups of up to 12 players.

image.alt: The Escape Game at Easton Town Center in Columbus

item.title: Ultimate Queen City is Haunted Tour
item.description: Get a new perspective on Cincinnati by taking this ghost tour that introduces you to the haunted history of Queen City. Follow your guide through the Over-the-Rhine neighborhood to several landmarks, such as Cincinnati Music Hall and Washington Park, where your guide will fill you in on their surprisingly spooky histories.

image.alt: Ultimate Queen City is Haunted Tour

item.title: Ohio City Neighborhood Food Tour of Cleveland
item.description: Whether you’re a local or a tourist, get to know Cleveland better on a food-focused tour of its coolest neighborhoods. With a small group of like-minded travelers and your foodie guide, start the tour at the West Side Market. Continue to a Mexican restaurant, a brewery, an ice-cream shop, a butcher, and more. Come hungry and enjoy tasty samples at each stop.

image.alt: Ohio City Neighborhood Food Tour of Cleveland

item.title: Ethnic Food Tour in Over the Rhine with Riverside Food Tours
item.description: Discover the vibrant culture of Cincinnati’s Over-The-Rhine neighborhood on a small-group tour that combines culinary treats and local history. Traveling between six different eateries lets foodies sample a wide variety of ethnic cuisines. Along the way, a guide shares stories about the neighborhood’s diverse past and provides details you would likely miss on your own.

image.alt: Ethnic Food Tour in Over the Rhine with Riverside Food Tours

item.title: Cincinnati Wine and Dessert Tour With Tastings
item.description: If you are unsure of where to find the best foodie and wine spots in Cincinnati, discover the Queen City's wine and food scene on this guided tour. You'll enjoy desserts from three great local businesses, as well as four tastings of wine from local winemakers and a behind-the-scenes tour of an urban winery.

image.alt: Cincinnati Wine and Dessert Tour With Tastings

item.title: Explore Columbus on The Trolley Pub
item.description: Sightsee and party for two hours while you pedal your way around the city on this electrically assisted party bike. The Trolley Pub is a great way for tourists to explore the fun side of the city for the first time, or for locals to see Columbus in a way they never have before. Your (sober) guide will show you around town and make sure the party doesn’t stop.

image.alt: Explore Columbus on The Trolley Pub

item.title: Cincy Brunch History and Streetcar Tour with Riverside Food Tours
item.description: Combine a delicious brunch with a walking tour. This small-group Saturday morning experience will have you exploring one of Cincinnati's most history-rich neighborhoods, by foot and by streetcar, while enjoying great food along the way. You'll visit Over-the-Rhine and the historic Findlay Market and enjoy dishes from six local eateries.

image.alt: Cincy Brunch History and Streetcar Tour with Riverside Food Tours

item.title: Cleveland Ghosts Tour
item.description: See a spookier side of Cleveland, Ohio with the help of a guide to show you around the city and share tales of its (allegedly) ghostly past, from historic battles to the casualties of organized crime. See The Arcade, Pickwick and Frolic Restaurant and Club, Connor Palace, and more as you safely walk the city streets at night with your group.

image.alt: Cleveland Ghosts Tour

item.title: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Admission in Cleveland
item.description: Visit the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame during your time in Cleveland, Ohio and see the exhibits at your own pace during your self-guided tour. Musicians in the Hall of Fame include The Beatles, Jimi Hendrix, The Rolling Stones, David Bowie, the Supremes, Metallica, Michael Jackson, and Parliament/Funkadelic.

image.alt: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Admission in Cleveland

item.title: Nightmare on Elm Street Walking Tour
item.description:
Step into the chilling embrace of history as you embark on an unforgettable journey through the enigmatic Over-The-Rhine neighborhood. Brace yourself for an eerie adventure that begins and ends at the renowned Northern Row Brewery.
Descend into the depths of the 1800s brewery tunnels, descending an astonishing 30 feet underground. Here, amidst the ancient brickwork, be prepared to encounter ghostly apparitions and eerie encounters that have been reported. Feel the whispers of the past echo through the dimly lit passages as you explore the spectral remnants of a bygone era.
As the tour reaches its haunting climax, join us back at the brewery.
Don't let this opportunity slip away

image.alt: Nightmare on Elm Street Walking Tour

item.title: Sunday Brunch at Findlay Market Tour with Riverside Food Tours
item.description: Explore the delicacies of the Findlay Market on this small-group brunch tour, where your guide makes sure you don’t miss any of the best bites, and leaves you filled-up, too. This is a historic German neighborhood, so don’t miss out on trying a goetta sandwich, plus so much more. Locals and tourists both enjoy this intimate tour, where there is always another delicious treat to try.

image.alt: Sunday Brunch at Findlay Market Tour with Riverside Food Tours

item.title: Cincinnati Ghosts By US Ghost Adventures
item.description: Cincinnati is home to many spooky sites, but visiting them alone doesn't offer the full picture. This guided walking tour takes you through the city after dark, to several haunted locations, including Memorial Hall, Washington Park and Taft's Ale House, where your guide will fill you in on their associated true life, chilling tales.

image.alt: Cincinnati Ghosts By US Ghost Adventures

item.title: Built on Beer Tour
item.description: See Cincinnati from a whole new perspective on this group walking tour that uncovers the city's brewing history and architecture. Walk the western portion of the historic Brewery District, and hear tales of beer empires from centuries gone by. Head underground to the cellars of Jackson Brewery, visit the Sohn/Mohawk Brewery, and see several Christian Moerlein sites. Conclude your tour with a refreshing pint of local beer.

image.alt: Built on Beer Tour

item.title: Mainstrasse Village Food Tour in Covington KY
item.description: Bring your appetite for this 3-hour walking and eating tour in Mainstrasse Village located in Covington, Kentucky, just five minutes from downtown Cincinnati. Linger in the German village, soaking up the charm of European architecture, a glockenspiel, cobblestone streets and fountains. Indulge in local treats, such as Bavarian pretzels, beer cheese, goetta chili dogs, homemade desserts, a tasting of local craft beer and much more!

image.alt: Mainstrasse Village Food Tour in Covington KY

item.title: Little Italy Neighborhood Food Tour of Cleveland
item.description: If a standard history tour does not appeal, combine history with delicious food on this guided tour. Explore Cleveland's Little Italy neighborhood and learn about the Italian culture that has held firm here for generations. Visit some of the area's best restaurants, some long-standing, some newer, and sample such typical dishes as pasta, pizza, and meatballs.

image.alt: Little Italy Neighborhood Food Tour of Cleveland

item.title: Haunted Cincinnati Booze and Boos Ghost Walking Tour
item.description: See the creepy side of Cincinnati on this haunted pub crawl and ghost tour of the Queen City. Your tour guide will dress in costume and meet you at Queen City Radio, the oldest bar in the city. Stroll to the spookiest spots in Cincy, grabbing some spirits of your own at the local bars on the way. Scary stories will fill your journey as you pass by the Ghost Baby Bar, Washington Park, and Rosedale bar.

image.alt: Haunted Cincinnati Booze and Boos Ghost Walking Tour

item.title: LEGOLAND Discovery Center Columbus Ticket
item.description: Ensure a hassle-free visit to LEGOLAND® Discovery Center Columbus by pre-booking your admission ticket. You'll avoid having to wait in the ticket line and have access to plenty of entertaining attractions to keep the whole family busy. Visit a virtual LEGO Factory, find Columbus, Cincinnati and Cleveland landmarks at Miniland, build with soft bricks at the DUPLO® Farm, or turn up the volume at LEGO Racers.

image.alt: LEGOLAND Discovery Center Columbus Ticket

item.title: Cincinnati's Original Findlay Market Tour With Tastings
item.description: Explore Cincinnati’s iconic Findlay Market, a landmark of the Over-the-Rhine neighborhood, and sample its many flavors on this small-group tasting and tour. Follow your guide around the historic market, meet with five different vendors and sample a variety of their specialty food items, while learning about the market

image.alt: Cincinnati's Original Findlay Market Tour With Tastings

item.title: Over The Rhine Cocktail Tour with Riverside Food Tours
item.description: Cincinnati is a huge city and finding the best spots to grab drinks can take some work if you don’t know the city well. Don’t rely on strangers’ recommendations—instead book this Cincinnati Over-The-Rhine Cocktail Tour. Go with a guide to up to four places in the historic German neighborhood to sip on some of the city’s most impressive cocktails. Plus, your guide teaches you about the area’s history and stops as you go.

image.alt: Over The Rhine Cocktail Tour with Riverside Food Tours
